projects.name: Social Media Dashboard
projects.description: This is a frontend challenge from frontendmentor.io. They give the mockup file and learner has to complete the code in own way. Check https://www.frontendmentor.io/solutions/social-media-dashboard-usign-react---wLbXIAr

projects.name: Social Blood
projects.description: This is a simple basic laravel 5.8 and vue based practice. The idea was creating a social platform where people can share there need for blood and others who want to donate can wish and contact to respective person.

projects.name: House Food
projects.description: Food Delivery App. Here is a basic frontend for signup and signin that can interact with api.

projects.name: Svelte Todo App
projects.description: Svelte is a new fronted javascript framework. Here is a basic TODO application using Sveltejs and its default store management.

projects.name: Bangla Dummy Text
projects.description: This is a simple bangla text generator based on reactjs and css. Texts are used from Banglapedia. This project is very simple using reactjs and hooks for managing state.

projects.name: Odhikar Community Site
projects.description: This site is created for BITM exam purpose. Technology was simply used to serve the purpose. HTML, Javascript & CSS was required as frontend exam.

projects.name: Incentive Solution for Remitance
projects.description: The website was created for managing incentive of remitance payment. Mainly the work was done under an employee of Agrani Bank Limited but due to security and permission issue the site is not published.
